downloadTitle: Hybrid Mobile Apps for ASP.NET Developers
downloadDescription: Learn how you can use your web development skills to create hybrid mobile applications for Android, iOS and Windows.

downloadFile.name: Hybrid mobile apps for ASP NET developers - FINAL - EN.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/7/c/87c46084-092a-498f-bda6-37e01b39683c/Hybrid mobile apps for ASP NET developers - FINAL - EN.pdf

detailsSection: Do you know that as an ASP.NET developer you already have the skills to create mobile apps for Android, iOS and Windows? See how you can quickly get up and running with our whitepaper covering Hybrid Mobile Apps for ASP.NET Developers.
detailsSection_file_name: Hybrid mobile apps for ASP NET developers - FINAL - EN.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Software
  • You will need a PDF reader like Adobe Reader to read the document.
  • To try the Cordova app sample you will need Visual Studio 2015 CTP 6 or later.
installInstructionSection:
• To read the document, click on the link and either open the file directly from the download center or save it to your computer and then open it locally.
  • For the sample application, extract the contents of the zip file to a location on your computer. Open SampleCordovaApp.sln with Visual Studio 2015 where you will see the sample application loaded and ready to be tried.
